thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 7 of 45
thread.title: TC

author: TC
title: TC
text: Having purchased a superautomatic espresso maker from them before -- years ago -- when it was time for a new one, I knew where to go. I shopped, watched review videos and purchased all on Whole Latte Love. I looked in other places, too, but nowhere else did I find the depth of content and expertise that they have. Prices win, too. I know; sounds too good to be a real review, but it is. They're great. And if you call in, you can ask questions of a real person who knows the products as well (not just a phone crew).
